'' Here are some helpful lists '' DoingStuff.DonaldNoyes.20140914
----
* Backlist on the page PageBeingGnomed - A list of pages in the process of being gnomed over more than a brief period of an hour or two
* RandomPages - Generated by this Wiki's Engine ( 4 times a day - midnight - 6 am - noon - 6 pm PortlandOregon time ) 
* WantedPages - contains instructions for preparing your own limited list of pages wanting to be
* Short form of RecentChanges, most recent first
** 24 hour period 
*** http://c2.com/cgi/quickChanges?days=1
